summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2193, for the improvement of the Alley in Block One Hundred Six (106), A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley between Eighth Avenue and Ninth Avenue, running from Union Street to University Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and planking the same, by constructing wood bulkheads where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 21814, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
